td.content: s:pt presents with Body Aches for about 5 days. she is a 32 YO white female environmental scientist. o:Height 166 cm, Weight 78.4 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 14 a:Osteoarthritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed acetaminophen - 650 mg up to 4x day, and ordered Hand Xray.

s:33 year old white female presents with 2 days history of moderate heart burn. patient also reports severe regurgitation, moderate retrosternal chest pain. o:Height 167 cm, Weight 80.9 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 16, Chest = Scattered crackles with occasional wheeze B/L a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.

s:a 33 year old female environmental scientist complains of severe regurgitation, moderate heart burn and moderate retrosternal chest pain. NKDA. she denies drinking alcohol she does not smoke o:Height 167 cm, Weight 80 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 15, Chest = Scattered crackles with occasional wheeze B/L a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Lansoprazole - 30 mg po qd x 8 week.
